item.description:
I really want to see this movie but can't make it on Saturday so I'm posting a second time/location for Sunday. I've posted it a little earlier in hopes we can grab dinner afterward.

Gran Torino:

Walt Kowalski is an iron-willed veteran living in a changing world, who is forced by his immigrant neighbors to confront his own long-held prejudices.

Cast: Clint Eastwood, Bee Vang, Ahney Her, Christopher Carley, Brian Haley
Director: Clint Eastwood
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the lobby. The movie starts at 4:50. Let's meet no later than 4:30.
item.name: Gran Torino
